title: Person
description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.

xdm:lastName.title: Last Name
xdm:lastName.description: The inherited family name, surname, patronymic, or matronymic name.

xdm:middleName.title: Middle Name
xdm:middleName.description: Middle, alternative, or additional names supplied between the first and last names.

xdm:courtesyTitle.title: Courtesy Title
xdm:courtesyTitle.description:
Normally an abbreviation of a persons *title*, *honorific*, or *salutation*.
The `courtesyTitle` is used in front of full or last name in opening texts.
e.g Mr. Miss. or Dr J. Smith.

xdm:birthDay.title: Birth Day
xdm:birthDay.description:
The day of the month a person was born (1-31).
Default 0 means absence.

xdm:birthMonth.title: Birth Month
xdm:birthMonth.description:
The month of the year a person was born (1-12).
Default 0 means absence.

xdm:birthYear.title: Birth Year
xdm:birthYear.description:
The year a person was born including the century (yyyy, e.g 1983).
Default 0 means absence.
